# Movie Mode

For more control over camera settings, rotate the mode dial to !Movie Icon (movie) and record movies using the shutter button.

1. Rotate the mode dial to !Movie Icon (movie).

   !Mode Dial

2. Press the shutter button to start recording.
   - A recording indicator (‚óè) is displayed while recording is in progress.
   - The borders of the display turn red during movie recording, green during high-speed recording.
   - The time remaining is shown by a countdown display, while another display counts up to show the recording time.

   !Recording Display

3. Press the shutter button again to end recording. Recording ends automatically when the maximum length is reached or the memory card is full.
